mcq.statement: What does it mean to 'catch someone red-handed'?

options.a: To find someone using red paint
options.b: To catch someone in the act of doing something wrong
options.c: To see someone with an injury
options.d: To play a game with someone

mcq.one_liner: The idiom 'catch someone red-handed' means to catch a person in the act of committing a wrongdoing or crime.
